name: Decypher
description:
Decypher offers a thrilling experience of deciphering hidden codes. Alongside the standard rule, the game introduces an array of exciting variants and a wide range of levels to keep you engaged.

Features


  • Code cracking: You are challenged to unravel a series of hidden digits by analyzing clues.

  • Variant rules: Decypher introduces a captivating range of variant rules to keep you engaged.

  • Tons of levels: Dive into numerous predefined levels, each offering its own unique challenge. From beginner-friendly puzzles to mind-boggling tests of logic, Decypher has something for everyone.

  • Note taking: Use built-in coloring and drawing functions to eliminate incorrect options or highlight important clues

  • Error highlight: If the player inputs a wrong answer, the violated rows will be highlighted to provide immediate feedback and aid in identifying the mistake.

  • Every puzzle in Decypher is carefully designed to ensure that it has one and only one unique solution.

With its addictive game modes and a variety of levels, Decypher promises endless hours of code-cracking entertainment. Sharpen your mind, embrace the challenge, and become the ultimate code-breaker in Decypher!

Play now and embark on an exciting journey of decryption mastery. Can you crack the code?
